summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of JodiFy MP3 player with new Neon Obsidian theme and enhanced features. All core functionality verified including queue system, equalizer, keyboard shortcuts, and modal z-index fixes.
passed_tests: CSS loads correctly with Neon Obsidian theme (--primary: #7F00FF, --secondary: #00F0FF, --accent: #FF0080)
All CSS variables properly defined and applied
HTML structure contains all required elements with correct data-testid attributes
Queue button (queueBtn) exists and opens drawer correctly
Equalizer button (eqBtn) exists and modal structure is present
Shortcuts modal (?/shortcutsModal) exists and responds to keyboard shortcuts
Modal z-index hierarchy fixed (login: 9999, modals: 1000, overlay: 999)
JavaScript syntax validation passed for app.js and supabase-config.js
Theme toggle functionality working (dark/light theme switching)
Keyboard shortcuts functional (? opens shortcuts, Escape closes modals)
Queue drawer opens/closes correctly with proper animations
Equalizer modal contains 6 presets and 10 frequency sliders
Player controls (play, prev, next, shuffle, repeat, like) all present and enabled
Settings modal with visualizer and background toggle options
Mobile responsive design (mobile playlist button hidden on desktop)
